fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You choose 3 players (dead or alive) during the day.
- The coming night, they all privately decide to live or die.
- If all decide to live, they all are attacked instead.
- Dead players who decide to live will come back to life.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, it is announced this role is in-play.
- Every morning, the three players you select are announced.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Cult of the Clocktower win the game.
